title: In-memory Engine: auto load does not handle the case that process=0
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->
Auto load can not correctly identify "many mvcc" region which process=0 in coprocessor stats.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
Nightly 2024/09/19.

### What did you expect?

Identify and load such "many mvcc" regions correctly.

comments_data.body: The issue has been resolved by #17560
